ttl.name: VEHICLE STABILITY CONTROL SYSTEM(w/ Pre-collision System)

para.dtcname: VSC does not Operate or VSC does not Operate Correctly

content5.ptxt: When TRC or VSC is operating, the skid control ECU (brake actuator assembly) blinks the slip indicator light to inform the driver that slippage occurred.
When a communication malfunction with the ECM is detected, TRC and VSC are disabled. Also, TRC and VSC are disabled when a DTC is stored.

When in VSC off mode, or TRC and VSC are disabled, the multi-information display in the combination meter assembly displays the TRC OFF message and the VSC OFF indicator light illuminates to inform the driver.

test1.ptxt: Check whether the slip indicator light was illuminated when VSC did not operate.

specitem.ptxt: The slip indicator light was illuminated.

atten4.ptxt: When a DTC is stored, the slip indicator light is illuminated and VSC does not operate due to the fail-safe function.

test1.ptxt: Check whether the vehicle speed was 15 km/h (9 mph) or less when VSC did not operate.

specitem.ptxt: The vehicle speed was 15 km/h (9 mph) or less.

atten4.ptxt: VSC does not operate when the vehicle speed is 15 km/h (9 mph) or less.

test1.ptxt: Check whether the vehicle was driven straight for a few seconds at 35 km/h (22 mph) or more.

specitem.ptxt: The vehicle was not driven straight for a few seconds at 35 km/h (22 mph) or more.

atten4.ptxt: When the ignition switch is turned to ON, as steering sensor zero point calibration is not performed below 35 km/h (22 mph), VSC will not operate until the vehicle is driven straight for a few seconds at 35 km/h (22 mph) or more.

test1.ptxt: Check that the tire of each wheel is the correct size.

specitem.ptxt: The tire of each wheel is the correct size.

action.actiontitle: REPLACE THE TIRE OF EACH WHEEL WITH THE CORRECT SIZE

test1.ptxt: Check that the yaw rate and acceleration sensor (airbag ECU assembly) has been installed properly.

specitem.ptxt: The yaw rate and acceleration sensor (airbag ECU assembly) is tightened to the specified torque.
The yaw rate and acceleration sensor (airbag ECU assembly) is not installed in a tilted position.
